title: Type 1 Throttle Tube Cable Roller. *NEW PRODUCTS*

posts.content: http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/ ... ?id=786740 i hope you checked with this guy before you ripped his idea off

As part of the design consultancy reviewing this design, I can deny any prior knowledge of any other products. My design consultancy and suggestions were freely given and received...at no fee...
Now I will look at the link and work out the differences..
Monkey offerred me one of these recently but I was unaware other designs were available..

Oh and lates black anodised product recieved with thanks G

My first plain one works fine as I expect the black version to...
LOL
Pardon, I don't remember any consaltiation over the design. It was designed & testing before anyone else saw it.

readyboy61 wrote:
http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/detail.php?id=786740 i hope you checked with this guy before you ripped his idea off


I designed mine long before I had seen JB's version, so I'm not sure how I have ripped his off his design when the are completely different. His is fabricated, mine is machined. Hadn't seen his before I started mine, although that's only my word. Any throttle roller is going to consist of 3 major element, the tube, a roller & a mount. It's all about how it works & the quality of the product.
I have a couple of reputable engine builders using mine version now & as they put it "the other version is ...." ( there words not mine)

...attach the tube...
Fit a grub screw..
???

Was only a joke...!
Limebug do a similar one too

susta wrote:
Limebug do a similar one too


Limebugs is the JB version.

Karl_F wrote:
susta wrote:
Limebug do a similar one too


Limebugs is the JB version.


No its not ask JB limebug are ripping them off
Karls is better quality than the one on the samba,you only have to look at them both to see the difference! Im glad i bought his anyway,far better machined !!!
I am real happy with mine, empi braided cable and dual springs and pedal spring...
Hand bags lads please !! Mines arrived looks the business cheers !!fitting alongwith Butteys pedal do dar what's the best cable to buy ?? ( link be nice )

I found the standard cable a bit stiff...so I ordered an empi braided cable from machine7

I think it was this one..
http://www.machine7.com/product.php?xProd=13517

Jamie ordered it in specially for me at the time...because they did not have any on the shelf
Is a universal fit have to cut to length..
Mail Jamie at sales@machine7.com to check


works a treat for me..
I have twin 40s and they were not closing down with the overall friction...over the length..
so we fitted two brackets and springs and a pedal spring, throttle roller and empi braided cable

Closes well now!

Ideal cable is what Graham has linked above, also its a good idea to fit the beetle conduit. http://www.machine7.com/product.php?xPr ... 0&xSec=817

Glad to hear it all works well now Graham.
Short tube roller now available for Bergman/Porsche fan kits, come with M4 S/S button head, 12mm penny washer & nyloc nut.
